backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization mixin, data types for players, teams, matches, auctions, and provides storage and utility functions including remaining purse calculation and user profile queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a deployment feature to relevant files, components, and tests with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purposes and behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing steps to build and publish Draft Version 15 to production, including checklists, smoke tests, and rollback plan.
frontend/index.css: Defines global styles and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark modes with Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root layout with optional profile setup modal and Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Admin header component showing admin info with login/logout controls and navigation using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/LeadingTeamIndic: UI component showing a glowing 'Leading' badge with crown icon and team name for auction leader display.
Provides UI to create matches and edit match results using form dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/PlayerAuctionDia: Manages player auction flow including starting auctions, placing bids, and assigning players after bidding.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: Handles listing, creating, editing, deleting players, team assignments, and launching player auctions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Simple modal allowing users to save their profile name using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/TeamBoughtPlayer: Displays players purchased by a specific team with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Renders team header UI with purse info and login/logout controls tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: Admin UI for creating teams, updating purses, and assigning or removing players using dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/components/TeamMatches.tsx: Displays match cards filtered by team, handling loading, errors, and winner highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating players, teams, matches, and user profiles via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders admin dashboard tabs for managing players, teams, and matches after loading user profile.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and redirects users based on profile, with options for anonymous navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: React page that loads the user's team or a selected team, fetching players, purse, and matches, and renders a dashboard with team info and selectors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-based persisted parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project state, including schema version, features, and deployment-related metadata.
